articles.title: CDC Urges Flu Shots - MedicineNet
articles.description: A new survey showing that nearly half of U.S. adults are not likely to get a flu shot this season has prompted federal health officials to urge all Americans to get the flu vaccines.
articles.content:
A new survey showing that nearly half of U.S. adults are not likely to get a flu shot this season has prompted federal health officials to urge all Americans to get the fluvaccines.

articles.title: How Adele Lost 100 Pounds in 2 Years - Entertainment Tonight
articles.description: Adele opens up in both British and American ‘Vogue’ about her 100-pound weight loss, how she did it and the public’s reaction to her new look.
